meanings.definition: To attach or fasten (something) with glue again.
meanings.sent1: I had to reglue the broken pieces of my favorite mug.
meanings.sent2: She will reglue the loose pages back into the book.
meanings.sent3: The craft project fell apart, so I had to reglue everything together.
meanings.sent4: His words were like glue that reglued my shattered confidence.
meanings.sent5: The old chair creaked as I reglued the wobbly leg, making it sturdy once more.

meanings.definition: The act of attaching or fastening something with glue again.
meanings.sent1: The reglue of the handle made the cup usable again.
meanings.sent2: He performed a reglue on the torn poster to preserve it.
meanings.sent3: The reglue of the puzzle pieces was a tedious task.
meanings.sent4: The reglue of the broken heart symbolized forgiveness and healing.
meanings.sent5: The reglue of the label on the jar made it look brand new.
